lead_paragraph: COLBY--Marvelle (Seitman), 83, on January 19. Survived by her devoted husband, Selig Alkon, beloved children Lisa (Paul) and Eric (Ann), cherished grandchildren Owen, Jade and Ella. Proud graduate of Hunter College, with a DPA from Nova University, Professor Emerita from Marymount Manhattan College with a career in education and advocacy. 1/3
